title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills, built using React and Tailwind CSS.

title: HumAi - AI Health Assistant
description: An AI-powered health chatbot and symptom checker integrated with a health awareness platform, built using React and Firebase.

title: BMI Calculator App
description: An Android application developed in Java that calculates Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the user's height and weight.

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: A fun two-player game developed in Android Studio using Java, featuring a clean UI and logical win detection.

title: Smart Public Toilet System
description: An IoT-powered system designed to monitor and manage public toilet maintenance efficiently, focusing on cleanliness and admin control.
